Item ID12373

The dragon cane is a reward from elite Treasure Trails that requires level 60 Attack to wield. This weapon has similar stats to the dragon mace (including the +5 Prayer bonus), although no quest completion is required to wield the dragon cane (while completion of Heroes' Quest is needed to wield the dragon mace). Unlike the mace however, it did not get updated to an attack speed of 4 along with the first stage of the 2021 equipment rebalance.

Unlike other canes, which use the Combat Options of maces, the dragon cane uses the combat options of polestaves.

[[File:Dragon cane detail.png|left|130px]]
The '''dragon cane''' is a reward from [[Clue scroll (elite)|elite]] [[Treasure Trail]]s that requires level 60 [[Attack]] to wield. This weapon has similar stats to the [[dragon mace]] (including the +5 [[Prayer bonus]]), although no quest completion is required to wield the dragon cane (while completion of [[Heroes' Quest]] is needed to wield the dragon mace). Unlike the mace however, it did not get updated to an attack speed of 4 along with the [[Update:Fishing Trawler Improvements and Equipment Rebalance: Part One|first stage of the 2021 equipment rebalance]].

Unlike other canes, which use the [[Combat Options]] of maces, the dragon cane uses the combat options of [[Polestaff|polestaves]].
